p: The locations of field specimens of all taxa and names are summarised in the Supplementary Files, Tables S1 and S2. Table S2 details the data that are published elsewhere but also included in the analysis that produced Figure 2. Vouchers of each accession were lodged at the N.C.W Beadle Herbarium at the University of New England, Armidale, NSW Australia. Data used from previous studies are available from the published literature [ 8, 13, 14].
